about_the_game:
This is the Original Soundtrack from the game "Adabana Odd Tales"!
It includes 15 BGM composed by Momoko Sapporo and Shinichiro Matsumoto, as well as a full-size version of the theme song "Adabana Yumeutsutsu" sung by Rita.

◆Data Format
WAV：44.1khz/16bit
MP3：320kbps
